channel.title: unity3d on zhili
channel.description: Recent content in unity3d on zhili

item.title: unity游戏提示 Using memoryadresses from more than 16GB of memory
item.description: 新游戏被用户狂喷无奈研究一下，先在官方的问题跟踪器查一下就发现很多开发者纷纷都说是android 11的问题，我当场裂开，修复完又要改代码，之前一直在模拟器调试没啥问题，我自己用pixel 11测试一下果然秒退，还好11没普及，修复不存在的，混就完事 See also https://issuetracker.unity3d.com/issues/android-il2cpp-empty-project-crashes-on-launch-with-using-memoryadresses-from-more-than-16gb-of-memory-messages
